part.content: CHAPTER II : SURVEY OF WAKFS. Sec. 4 - 8.
CHAPTER III : CENTRAL WAKF COUNCIL. Sec. 9 - 12.
CHAPTER IV : ESTABLISHMENT OF BOARDS AND THEIR FUNCTIONS. Sec. 13 - 35.
CHAPTER V : REGISTRATION OF WAKFS. Sec. 36 - 43.
CHAPTER VI : MAINTENANCE OF ACCOUNTS OF WAKFS. Sec. 44 - 71.
CHAPTER VII : FINANCE OF THE BOARD. Sec. 72 - 82.
